docs.snippet: China raised import duties on a $3 billion list of U.S. pork, fruit and other products Monday in an escalating tariff dispute with President Donald Trump that companies worry might depress global commerce.

headline.print_headline: China Raises Tariffs on US Pork, Fruit in Trade Dispute
headline.main: China Raises Tariffs on US Pork, Fruit in Trade Dispute

docs.snippet: U.S. agricultural machinery maker Deere & Co said on Wednesday it would monitor Beijing's new tariff proposals to evaluate their impact on the company and its customers.

headline.print_headline: Deere Says Assessing Impact of Beijing's New Tariffs
headline.main: Deere Says Assessing Impact of Beijing's New Tariffs

docs.snippet: A group of U.S. states and cities sued the Trump administration to stop it from asking people filling out 2020 census forms whether they are citizens.

headline.print_headline: States, Cities Sue U.S. to Block 2020 Census Citizenship Question
headline.main: States, Cities Sue U.S. to Block 2020 Census Citizenship Question

docs.snippet: Intercontinental Exchange Inc's New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) is in talks to buy the Chicago Stock Exchange (CHX), the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, a month-and-a-half after U.S. regulators blocked the sale of CHX to China-based investo...

headline.print_headline: NYSE in Talks to Acquire Chicago Stock Exchange: Wall Street Journal
headline.main: NYSE in Talks to Acquire Chicago Stock Exchange: Wall Street Journal

docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:
Readers discuss two columns questioning the “Sex and the City” star Cynthia Nixon’s campaign to become governor of New York.

headline.main: Cynthia Nixon’s Campaign: No Experience Required?

docs.snippet: Atlantic City's former Revel casino is moving toward its reincarnation as the Ocean Resort Casino.

headline.print_headline: Former Revel Casino Moving Toward Reopening as Ocean Resort
headline.main: Former Revel Casino Moving Toward Reopening as Ocean Resort

docs.snippet: Cfius, a government panel reviewing Broadcom’s $117 hostile takeover bid for chip maker Qualcomm, said it may refer the deal to President Trump for rejection.

headline.print_headline: Panel Warns Broadcom That Its Deal   Dims Future  Of Takeover By Broadcom
headline.main: Broadcom’s Bid for Qualcomm May Be Headed for Rejection, U.S. Panel Warns

docs.snippet: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.

headline.main: Russia, Stormy Daniels, N.C.A.A. Basketball: Your Monday Briefing

docs.snippet: Online retailing behemoth Amazon.com Inc has cut ties with Washington lobbying firms Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP and Squire Patton Boggs, Bloomberg reported on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Amazon Cuts Ties With Top Washington Lobbying Firms: Bloomberg
headline.main: Amazon Cuts Ties With Top Washington Lobbying Firms: Bloomberg
